p: As showed in Figs. 3A and 3F, suitable areas under current conditions of N. jatamansi were mainly distributed in the Qinghaiâ€“Tibetan Plateau in China, including western parts of Sichuan Province, northern Yunnan Province, the eastern part of the Tibetan Autonomous Region, and a small part of southern Qinghai and Gansu Provinces. In addition, it has a small suitable area in India, Bhutan, and Nepal. Among these distributions, the suitable areas of Sichuan, Tibet, and Yunnan are extensive and concentrated in the high mountain plateau region, which was roughly in line with the records of the distribution of N. jatamansi.
